metadata.name: Dreams 01
metadata.description:
Moonlight night... 
Cold light floods the roof of a castle, through a large window enters a chamber in a tower.


A beam fells on a beautiful girl's face who is sleeping all naked in her chambers. 
The light caresses her.
Silence...
Suddenly, girl's face distorted. She started breathing heavily and moving her arms. She seems to have a nightmare.

A low moan sounds in the room...
She's got lost in her nightmare...


Then suddenly, a moonbeam moved. 
It took the form of a human figure... A figure of a musician with a violin.


The Moon raised its bow, and wonderful quiet music filled the castle.
The shadows thickening on the walls seemed to disappear... Girl's face became smooth. The nightmare has gone away...

The Moon was saving her, playing until the morning.

And when a dawn lit the sky and the crescent faded away, the figure stopped playing and dissolved in the air.

Morning came.
